targets.rawSql: SELECT "model" FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo
SELECT "sn" FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo
SELECT "firmware_version" FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo
SELECT "software_version" FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo
SELECT "device_status" FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo

SELECT 
selector_last(state1, time)['value'] as state1_last
FROM 
(SELECT "state1", time FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo order by time asc)
SELECT "battery_soc" FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo order by time asc
SELECT "battery_unit1_battery_temperature" FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo order by time asc

SELECT 
selector_last(meter_meter_type, time)['value'] as meter_meter_type
FROM 
(SELECT "meter_meter_type", time FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo order by time asc)

SELECT 
selector_last(meter_status, time)['value'] as state1_last
FROM 
(SELECT "meter_status", time FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo order by time asc)

SELECT 
selector_last(meter_active_power, time)['value'] as meter_active_power
FROM 
(SELECT "meter_active_power", time FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo order by time asc)

SELECT 
selector_last(peak_active_power_of_current_day, time)['value'] as state1_last
FROM 
(SELECT "peak_active_power_of_current_day", time FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo order by time asc)

SELECT 
selector_last(battery_charge_discharge_power, time)['value'] as battery_charge_discharge_power
FROM 
(SELECT "battery_charge_discharge_power", time FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo order by time asc)

SELECT 
selector_last(battery_running_status, time)['value'] as state1_last
FROM 
(SELECT "battery_running_status", time FROM "sun2000_monitoring" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo order by time asc)
